General.Name: Potasios de Chile S.A. A
General.Description: Potasios de Chile S.A. engages in investing in shares and other financial instruments in Chile. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Potasios de Chile S.A. is a subsidiary of Nitratos de Chile SA.
General.Address: Calle El Trovador No. 4285, Santiago de Chile, Chile
